channel.title: Portfowarding issue
channel.description: hello, while i was trying to portforward my rsps, i encountered a problem, i was told to go under my firewall and allow a server but when i try to open it it gives me and error like "Windows has found an unidentified issues, windows cannot display firewall settings" I HAVE LOOKED EVERYWHERE TO FIX THIS FIREWALL ISSUE!! and i cannot seem to fix it, im running a windows vista home basic computer. Is there any ways to portfoward my server without my firewall?? please help me :)

item.title: Portfowarding issue
item.dc:creator: @XfinitBankai XfinitBankai
item.description:
@XfinitBankai wrote:

hello, while i was trying to portforward my rsps, i encountered a problem, i was told to go under my firewall and allow a server but when i try to open it it gives me and error like “Windows has found an unidentified issues, windows cannot display firewall settings” I HAVE LOOKED EVERYWHERE TO FIX THIS FIREWALL ISSUE!! and i cannot seem to fix it, im running a windows vista home basic computer. Is there any ways to portfoward my server without my firewall?? please help me
